analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/29/0xcc926964c1ffa416f4f20709faf56375e61372ff.sol:
	Contract ravikirannodecoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/29/0xcc926964c1ffa416f4f20709faf56375e61372ff.sol#223)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/29/0xcc926964c1ffa416f4f20709faf56375e61372ff.sol#93) is not in mixedCase
